documents.document: @Kiwiseabreeze as they arise. But I'd be very interested to hear...

Okay. After about five attempts I absolutely refuse to use https://t.co/uc8ReHPhGs - most ridiculous sign in ever. Other suggestions?

I've always refused to use Uber because of concerns about the effect on marginalized people. Pretty stoked now.

So freaking happy. I just got my laptop off daughter, and discovered I had saved all their baby photos after all. Thought lost forever.
@sarabeee the awful tummy bug a week ago is a major suspect. I don't have an appendix anymore, so its not that ;).
@_vitaminK @thelemonofpink the only 2 people I saw dressed up today were ladies in their 70s. True story.
I have had an intensely sore stomach for a week. It has just finally started to feel better. Thank god for that.
